body.name: Izzo Swami 6000 Handheld Golf GPS Water-Resistant Color Display with 38,000 Course Maps & Scorekeeper
features: Handheld GPS: Our handheld GPS units come preloaded with over 38,000 global course maps, require no subscription fees, and include free updates
Precise Measurements: Our golf GPS devices provide accurate distances to the front, center, and back of the green as well as layup and carry distances to the front and back of hazards and doglegs
Automatic Functions: Complete with auto-course recognition, our golf GPS devices also feature auto-hole advance and individual shot distance measurements
Hands-Free Viewing: The ultimate golf cart accessories, our handheld GPS units are equipped with an integrated magnet designed to attach to the cart frame for hands-free, eye-level viewing
Digital Scorekeeper & Color Display: Our golf GPS includes a digital scorekeeper that saves round scores; The large, vibrant 2’’ color display is easy to read and operate
body.description: The new and improved SWAMI 6000 gives you everything you need right in the palm of your hand. Quickly and easily determine distances to the front, center, and back of the green, and distances to the front and back of hazards and doglegs for over 38,000 courses worldwide with no annual fee. A large, easy-to-read display makes it simple to operate your digital scorecard. The SWAMI 6000 is even water-resistant and equipped with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery capable of holding a 16 hour charge.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Izzo Swami 6000 Golf GPS Blue Have confidence in your game when you bring the Swami 6000 to the course! This Swami Golf GPS was engineered to display everything you need to know to advance your game with every swing. With 4 different modes, you'll always know distances to the front, center and back of green, as well as distances to hazards. Plus, keep track of your score and use shot distance to know your yardage. Highlights: Handheld GPS Automatic functions Precise measurement Magnahold technology Pre-loaded with 38,000 maps Rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery

Callaway EZ Laser Rangefinder Callaway Tour-S Golf Laser Rangefinder, Slope Version Callaway 350 Pro Slope Laser Golf Rangefinder, Gray/Red Laser Range 5-800 yards 5-1200 yards 5-1000 yards View Finder Magnification 5x 7x 6x P.A.T. (Pin Acquisition Technology) Range 275 yards 400 yards 300 yards P.A.T. Accuracy +/- 1 yard +/- 1 yard +/- .5 yard Scan Multiple Targets ✓ ✓ ✓ Additional Features Magna-hold, Slope Technology, Exterior LCD Prism Technology, Slope Technology Magna-hold, Slope Technology

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Accurate and easy to read
reviews.reviewText: LIKE:Good price,compact,accurate,loads satellites fairly quickly,easy to read distance,strong magnet for attaching to front cart post,recharges fast,finds lots of courses.I did not try the extended features, but they sound useful.Hint: severe bouncing will cause the magnet to slip, a tie wrap around post solves that problem.DISLIKE:Control buttons are not easy to use,if you get too close to the next tee on your approach, it switches to next hole and won't stay on current hole even when manually clicked back to current hole,hook it to charger while off, it turns on and stays on when unhooked, must remember to manually turn it off,battery lasts about 1and 3/4 rounds or 6 to 7 hours, still, not bad,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it!
reviews.reviewText: The Swami is a very simple “no frills” GPS. Read the product description carefully. It is an accurate description and don’t expect anything more this unit than what it tells you. First off, the magnet is very strong and will not fall off of the carts window frame upright during use. It won’t even slide down. It is very stable. It picks up GPS signal in less than a minute from power-up and “play mode” is selected. The course you are at will be at the top of the list. You may have to choose which 9 hole course you are playing first if the course if flipped their 9’s that day, or you play at a 27 hole course. It is simple and straightforward. The score keeping is not good on this unit. My suggestion, just keep a regular scorecard. You get three yardages and their is no hole layout. You can distances to hazards quickly by pressing the “right hand arrow” and pressing it again will bring you back to your regular yardage screen. This unit is $100. Spend more if you want more. I got so sick and tired of shooting pins with my laser, I find this to be a welcomed little tool. I keep my laser in my bag, but usually don’t remove it anymore. I’m a 9 handicap and this works fine for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's really, really good with 2 things that are truly annoying.
reviews.reviewText: It really is so cool. It works great, has a nice bright screen. Resolution really is terrible for 2022 standards, but I read the specs and expected that. Magnet is strong for cart usage. Also has a belt clip that just attaches to the magnet. Seems to be accurate (but I tend to find every GPS gizmo my buddies have are all pretty accurate out on the course). However...the 6000 was clearly designed/manufactured years ago now and I'm kind of annoyed with 2 things. OK, I'm really annoyed. 1. Micro USB connector instead of USB-C. I just recently got rid off all things non-USB-C in my life and here is the Izzo Swami 6000 to ruin it all! 2. You can't charge it and use it at the same time!!!! When you connect the charger it overrides all functionality and you're stuck on a black screen with a battery meter on it.I promise to love this little device for this golf season and give our relationship an honest effort. But I do predict these 2 things are going to eat away at that love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unit, great price.
reviews.reviewText: I've had a number of golf GPS units, none that I've been very satisfied with for one reason or another. This one has it all. I've used it a number of times already. It is fantastic in all aspects. Great price, charges quickly, holds charge for a long time, finds the course quicker than any other I've had, accurate and magnet sticks extremely well to metal on golf cart. It's small enough to put into your pocket when you need to walk across the fairway but screen is large enough to easily read when it's mounted on the cart. If you're looking for a great little GPS for a great price, this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product that they stand behind.
reviews.reviewText: I have used this device for several years now andI really like the functionality and ease of use. I like this enough that when mine broke andwas out of warranty I purchased another identical one. Then I contacted the company to see if they could fix my original one. The charging port had come loose and was inside the device so that I couldn't plug in my charging cable. You can't take these apart so I was out of luck. When I contacted them to see if they could fix it, they were kind enough to replace my out of warranty device with a refurbished one. Now I have two of them and I find this a great thing because if I forget to charge one I have a backup. Thanks very much to the company for standing behind their product and caring about their customers. They get me as a customer for life!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the way the Swami holds onto the cart frame. Get to the ball, take a quick glance at the yardage, pick a club, hit and move on!

reviews.reviewTitle: Faltan campos y no actualizan (llevo 2 años pidiendolo :(
reviews.reviewText: Compre el articulo y muy bien, salvo que no trae el campo donde normalmente juego. Les escribi para darles toda la info del campo y despues de varios intentos me respondieron que seguramente saldria en una proxima actualizacion. A 2 años de distancia sigue sin aparecer el campo cuando muchas otros dispositivos de otras marcas ya lo traen, satisfecho con el producto decepcionado con la Empresa.

The first unit I received did not work. From that experience I learnt the following:#1. Amazon’s return policy is simple/easy to follow and worked seamlessly…..full marks.#2. Izzy Support was extremely professional, and although they were unable to repair the unit, they were great to work with…..full marks.The replacement unit was received in record time. The replacement unit is working well. It is simple to use and I enjoy the magnetic function that allows the operator to mount the gps unit where it is easy to view. I did hear about users who left the unit on the cart when leaving in a hurry. I have addressed this concern by using a storage case. I use an old eye glass case, that I put in the cart, with the belief that I will see the empty case and remember to grab the gps unit. We will see. I have found that the batteries last two full rounds before recharging.

Only used it once so far on a course that was redeveloped a few years back so wasn't sure if it would pick it up. It did. It was very accurate as well, surprising my playing partner who had an expensive range finder. Shot distance option is pretty cool as is the hazards distancing. all up pretty much exactly what I was looking for so very happy. Price was worth waiting a few weeks for as well.
Este producto si cumplió en un porcentaje alto lo que esperaba , es práctico y lo recomiendo

I bought this in February 2021 as a replacement for a GPS unit that died. So far, it's been great and gives, as far as I can determine, accurate measurements to the green and hazards. But I stopped short of giving it five stars as it doesn't automatically detect which course I'm on as I have to select the course manually every time.
